# R Code 2_19 {-}

```{r 2.19}
library(PASWR2) # PASWR2 contains data frame BODYFAT

BODYFAT$sex <- factor(BODYFAT$sex, labels = c("Female", "Male"))
boxplot(fat ~ sex, data = BODYFAT, col = c("gray80", "gray20"), ylab = "Percent Bodyfat")
```
